name: SixtySecondsSavingsCoach
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Sixty Seconds Savings Coach is a daily message from BeyondPennies.com encouraging you to save your money, invest wisely, and grow your income. This daily message is for those of you who are on the road to financial freedom - and those of you who want to be! Simply add this skill to Alexa and listen to your flash briefing every morning. Aka Sixty Second Savings Coach. Topics covered include wealth creation, budgeting, saving-money, motivation, financial freedom, investments, personal finance, stock-market, minimalism, emergency-fund, financial-reporting, KPIs, and more.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
